title: The Duke & The Vicar's Daughter
description: The Duke & The Vicar's DaughterA traditional Regency romantic adventure.The Duke of Edbury decides he must marry an heiress if he is to save his estates. So far he has managed to stay out of the clutches of the predatory mama's who spend the Season searching for suitable husbands for their daughters. The god-daughter of his aunt, Lady Patience, might be a suitable candidate and he is persuaded to act as a temporary guardian to both Lady Patience and her cousin, Miss Charity Lawson.When Charity and Patience exchange places the fun begins.There is also the matter of an abandoned baby and an abduction, as well as the inevitable misunderstanding between Hugo and Charity, to sort out before there can be a happy resolution.
author: Fenella J. Miller
